post.body: I'm sick of seeing those obey posters. No, I won't obey. Now clean up your mess. Booyeah.
nice weather in NYC! Time to check in then grab crabrolls.
New York new York, wow that was fast.
http://twitpic.com/pu7x
Check-In staff late for work, playing chrono trigger on Nintendo DSi. This thing is rad.
http://twitpic.com/ptzx
Bye bye mustang rental # 27. 6am flight no fun.
Off to NYC
Diapers missing.
Toast black.
Fish burnt.
I'm Mr. Mom all by myself today. And just like Michael Keaton, the kitchen's a mess and clothes I didn't know we had are covering the floor
Coast to Coast! Aliens praised as gods? Dogs and Cats living together? Ordering Japanese transformers online. Drawing Babo coupons.
Ugly just won the big award for not making crap with lead in it from parenting awards. thank you for noticing.
Opening toys from 1999 for the first time, chogokin gogoV!
2009 SENTAI ROBO SPY IMAGE! http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y21/chungie/1227157070190.jpg
I mean whales.
Welch's grape soda ( Korean version ) Eating noodles. Listening to Coast 2 Coast AM. Wondering if wales are real. I've seen blurry photos.
This is a good deal! http://page15.auctions.yahoo.co.jp/jp/auction/t94480481
Ice-Bat statue now in the office, but it's HUGE and blocking the lucky neko cats. That's a no no.
Sitting in Disney lobby, meeting was to be at 10. Uh oh! Nobody here! If anyone at Disney reads this, I'm here! http://twitpic.com/qbuf
No chrome on USA galvatron! Boo! http://twitpic.com/qbgs
Wow I lost my resistance to American restaurant food.
Breakfast time at the W, no sea weed soup
Today show! Uglydolls at 9:22am est http://twitpic.com/q2po
No rest in NYC, up at 5am and meetings all day and night.
Stuck in traffic http://twitpic.com/qv0t
Midnite. Uglycon opening is done. we hope you had fun! wow, the water thing was insane!!!!!!!
Uglycon today, jet lag starting to catch up with me. Woken up by what sounded like an elephant, but at 40 floors up? Maybe flying elephant.
Uglycon art/items will indeed go on sale online mid week!
Also check out our print at the GR-SF printed matter show!
We called the cops on the water dropper and the police never showed!
We have a few pieces in the GR2 post-it show!
Bye bye NYC via bumpy cab ride.
Dusting toy robots, but taking them down and putting them back after cleaning is NOT playing. No no.
Dusting office, which I hate because then I'm not working.
Uglycon items going up online on either Thursday or Friday. Will post info on blog asap.
back to work
ok nevermind i couldnt take it anymore. I swam to manhattan to look around, too much fighting.
my PS3 name is uglydoll, on GTA4 online now
OK! Im online on GTA4. I think my name is either uglydoll or uglydolls.
How do you go online with GTA4? Maybe I'm lost. This is my only "play day" before going back to making books.
Finally got our PS3 online but have to use a wire to do it. And the wire is in the way...so this is the first and last time? Hmm.
ugly copy cats showing up on that certain DIY site are going to get zapped.
Giant Robot has the Uglycon Poes up online now. Here: http://tinyurl.com/7x8f5t
http://tinyurl.com/4j5zkt
UGLYCON ITEMS ARE UP on GRNY.NET!
I'm calling it. The latest toys from Playskool blow all current designer toys out of the water.
Maybe the designers at Hasbro need to wear hoodies and spell everything with a Z at the end. But come on, the new Fisher Price stuff is rad.
I'm on a very anti-designer toy rant thing. Really, Mattel and Hasbro are making such awesome ###, so what's the fuss.
I've been picking up some amazing mass market toys. Tell me why designer toys are good again? Just TRY to beat masterpiece starscream.
Tony Nowak is making the official Uglydoll internal company jackets. 3 done and here by tomorrow, the others on the way. Will we have extra?
winter ice making ichat with east coast office tricky, but why?
Just approved 2010 Uglydoll calendar proof. Looks great.
Due to a hasbrotoyshop button press mistake, I now own 8 HOUND transformer figures from the new series. But he's so cool, Im keeping them.
Final Trunko production samples approved, so he's on his way to the USA.
Hey Hasbro, sure are lots of transformers on ebay months before release. Lets cut the middle man...just send them straight to me.
http://tinyurl.com/9zsdwc
OBAMA'S kid wears Uglydoll to first day of school, says AP
http://tinyurl.com/8l26bx=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1231164927&sr=1-5
DEHARAVATH 2 NYC will be about OTAKU
Almost blew out my ear drums with a Pokemon Microphone. Insane. I hope nobody is talking to me, because if they are I wouldnt know.
Writing Uglyguide book 4 final text. Counting days to deadline. Wait...HOW many?
Ordering Brave and the Bold Batman toys online.
Eating Po Bang, sort of bread filled with red beans.
2009 is hours away, but how far is 2012?
DEHARA X DAVID HORVATH FEb 7th 2009, NYC at GIANT ROBOT NYC.
I get really ill when I mix alcohol. Soju....ok. Beer....ok. But Beer AND soju? Wish me luck.
its 2009 in Korea soon. Quiet one for us this year. Tough times face many soon. You're in our thoughts. Yeah but time for SOJU!!!!! woot
Respect to the designers at Mattel, Hasbro, Takara/Tomy and Ban Dai.
http://tinyurl.com/6arx8n
People who don't believe in Roswell or UFOs are NUT JOBS!
Now I'm drawing the 3rd Ugly board book and deciding on 2010 plush release line up.
Just had italian food with Sun-Min while grandma watches Mina, those lunches are rare. We left as soon as we could because we missed her.
"Still have to go to work tomorrow" was what my father said anytime I told him about new UFO or alien proof.
Wow ok so the 6th man to walk the moon says aliens are real and the big shots in the Govt told him so. Still have to go to work tomorrow.
In fact YOU KNOW someone is going to cut you in line today. So Dave sez: let it all go. Doing so brings you good parking spots inthe future
